About This Game

Mortal Kombat X - fighting the new generation and the next chapter of the legendary series from the famous studio NetherRealm. The developers managed to create the most entertaining and deep fighting game in the history of Mortal Kombat, where violent fights cinematic quality teamed with new gameplay elements. All characters Mortal Kombat X speak several fighting styles , in which use completely different special moves and combos.

Due to the deep integration of network functions , each player will participate in a global battle for supremacy in which any fight can tip the scales in one direction or another . An exciting story campaign introduces the complicated story of the set of characters , including the legendary veterans known to every fan of fighting games as well as beginners , for the first time facing a deadly battle.

Features Of This Game

- By the famous Scorpion , Sub-Zero , Rayden and Kano joined by new characters : Cassie Cage Kotal Kahn, Di'Vora and Ferrat and Torr.

- Each character Mortal Kombat X before the battle chooses fighting style that defines the strategy of the fight , a set of special moves and abilities.

- Events exciting story campaign taking place for 25 years after the end of the previous games in the series . The new grim stories prominent role assigned to a new generation of fighters , including Cassandra Cage (daughter of Johnny Cage and Sonya Blade ) , Jacqueline Briggs (daughter of Jackson " Jax " Briggs ) , Takahashi Takeda (son swordsman Kenshi ) and Jin Kun , in direct relationship with Kung Lao .

- In Mortal Kombat X was a place famous methods of X-ray, and the legendary finishing Fatality and Brutality. With improved graphics, animation and a new generation of exciting fights look particularly impressive!
